tags: the closer we get to E3 amd a potential release date the more excited i feel
it just looks like such a good game!
please discuss these small details with me!
summary: The E3 showcase is pretty soon and rewatching the gameplay video is building hype! I like this screenshot because there’s so...
body:
The E3 showcase is pretty soon and rewatching the gameplay video is building hype! I like this screenshot because there’s so much going on! Let me rant about it. (Even though I imagine it’s been covered in excess on YouTube)

The first thing I noticed (and admittedly kinda bugs me) is all the quest markers! Jacket, ripperdoc clinic, computer etc. There’s a lot going on but I imagine there’s an option to highlight which quests you want to track (like in Skyrim?) but also note that one quest in the upper right corner says to check an ‘email from your ripperdoc’. I’m getting Mass Effect vibes where there’s gonna be random emails to check in on but that actually sounds pretty cool. Especially if we get to reply to emails and it effects quests??

The layout of Vs apartment is also pretty cool. I like paying attention to things like that (as a fic writer) but also it’s just interesting. V has a little office corner, then her bathroom area. Next to that is a handy vending machine then next to that is her bed and the window. It’s just cool. I can’t wait to see what other places V can live in in the full game!

If you want, send me your favourite screenshot and I’ll tell you what I think about it!

title: EL DESARROLLO DE CYBERPUNK 2077 TENDRÍA LOS MISMOS PROBLEMAS QUE ANTHEM #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #CYBERPUNK2077 #Juegos
body:
EL DESARROLLO DE CYBERPUNK 2077 TENDRÍA LOS MISMOS PROBLEMAS QUE ANTHEM #CorporativoArcanos #Masukomi #SutaArcanos #Noticias #CYBERPUNK2077 #Juegos

El juego de Cyberpunk 2077 es uno de los más esperados por los fans de los RPG. Desde que se presentó su primer tease tráiler en enero del año 2013, su concepto futurista atrajo la atención de todos. Pero su desarrollo al parecer no ha sido el idóneo, ya que exempleados del estudio CD Projekt RED, afirman que las cosas son similares a lo que ocurrió con Anthem.

A inicios de abril, el editor de…

summary: Marcin Iwiński To Talk CD Projekt Red And Cyberpunk 2077 At E3 2019
title: Marcin Iwiński To Talk CD Projekt Red And Cyberpunk 2077 At E3 2019
body:
Marcin Iwiński To Talk CD Projekt Red And Cyberpunk 2077 At E3 2019 | #Cyberpunk #Cyberpunk2077 #CP2077 #E3 #E32019

CD Projekt Red is a saint to many, terrible to others, and has a checkered past according to some; whether you like their games or not, the company will appear at E3 2019. While at the upcoming games expo, CEO Marcin Iwiński will talk and discuss the company’s past, present, future, and Cyberpunk 2077. (more…)

summary: Un ex de CD Projekt desvela problemas en el desarrollo de Cyberpunk 2077
title: Un ex de CD Projekt desvela problemas en el desarrollo de Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Un ex de CD Projekt desvela problemas en el desarrollo de Cyberpunk 2077

Cyberpunk 2077 es uno de los juegos más esperados, ya sea de la actual generación de consolas como de la que está por llegar. Por ello el escuchar que está teniendo problemas en su desarrollo nos pone a todos un poco en alerta.

Eso al menos es lo que ha desvelado un ex empleado de CD Projekt RED a Kotaku. Tanto es así que compara la situación de Cyberpunk 2077 con todos los problemas revelados…

summary: A CD Projekt Red humánusan zsákmányolja ki a dolgozóit
title: A CD Projekt Red humánusan zsákmányolja ki a dolgozóit
body:
A CDPR fejesei megpróbáltak elébe menni egy nagyobb balhénak. Sikerült nekik?

A Kotaku legújabb oknyomozása a méltán híres lengyel fejlesztőcég függönye mögé les be: vajon tényleg sanyargatják a fejlesztőiket?

Az utóbbi időben megszaporodtak azok a hírek, amelyek a különféle játékfejlesztő stúdiókon belüli túlkapásokról, embertelen elvárásokról, túlórákról szólnak. Csak az elmúlt pár hónapban kikezdték a Rockstart a Red Dead Redemption miatt, a Bioware-t az Anthem kapcsán…

I've grown extremely fond of Tessa as a character so I've developed her backstory quite a lot
anyway; every time I look at Chrissie I can only think 'how did this beautiful fairy fall in love with this gremlin woman'

summary:
#CDProjekt promete ser "mas humano" con los desarrolladores en #Cyberpunk2077 que #TheWitcher3

Mientras los desarrolladores,...
caption:
#CDProjekt promete ser “mas humano” con los desarrolladores en #Cyberpunk2077 que #TheWitcher3

Mientras los desarrolladores, los fanáticos y las figuras de la industria continúan expresándose en contra del crujido en el desarrollo de juegos, los jefes de CD Projekt, Adam Badowski y Marcin Iwiński se han comprometido a mejorar las cosas en el estudio.

tags: kinda remonds me of the rivalmances in da2
summary: Obviously, the romance options in Cyberpunk 2077 are a big deal to me. So I was thinking, there’s gonna (allegedly) be a variety...
body:
Obviously, the romance options in Cyberpunk 2077 are a big deal to me. So I was thinking, there’s gonna (allegedly) be a variety of relationships that V can have with people in Night City. And a big theme of the game is about player choice when it comes to how the player approaches quests.

That got me wondering…say for example V had a love interest who hates corpos but V ends up helping a whole bunch of corpos and choosing their side at every option. Do you think it would cause the corpo hating love interest to ‘break it off’ with V? Like your choices in the game affect your romances?

Do you think it would cause the corpo hating love interest to ‘break it off’ with V? Like your choices in the game affect your romances?

Do you think it would cause the corpo hating love interest to ‘break it off’ with V? Like your choices in the game affect your romances?

summary:
Ok sooooo...E3 is less than a month away and Cyberpunk 2077 is gonna be involved somehow.
What are you expecting to see?...
body:
Ok sooooo…E3 is less than a month away and Cyberpunk 2077 is gonna be involved somehow.

What are you expecting to see? Realistically or not. A launch trailer? More gameplay? Character creation? Romance options? Gang info? A release date? A surprise launch!?

Tell me what you wanna see and let’s get hype together!!!
